kickstart.post:
/sbin/chkconfig httpd on
ServerRoot "/etc/httpd"
Listen *:80 Listen *:443
LoadModule unixd_module modules/mod_unixd.so LoadModule mpm_event_module modules/mod_mpm_event.so LoadModule log_config_module modules/mod_log_config.so LoadModule authz_core_module modules/mod_authz_core.so LoadModule ssl_module modules/mod_ssl.so LoadModule socache_shmcb_module modules/mod_socache_shmcb.so LoadModule proxy_module modules/mod_proxy.so LoadModule proxy_http_module modules/mod_proxy_http.so LoadModule headers_module modules/mod_headers.so LoadModule alias_module modules/mod_alias.so
User apache Group apache
ErrorLog logs/error_log
LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b" common CustomLog logs/access_log common
Header always set Strict-Transport-Security "max-age=15768000"
SSLSessionCache shmcb:/var/run/httpd/sslcache(512000) SSLSessionCacheTimeout 300
<Directory /> AllowOverride None Require all denied </Directory>
<VirtualHost *:80> ServerName comet-nucleus.sdsc.edu Redirect "/" "https://comet-nucleus.sdsc.edu/" </VirtualHost>
<VirtualHost *:443> ServerName comet-nucleus.sdsc.edu SSLEngine On
SSLProxyEngine on SSLProxyVerify none SSLProxyCheckPeerCN off SSLProxyCheckPeerName off SSLProxyCheckPeerExpire off
SSLProtocol all -SSLv2 -SSLv3 SSLHonorCipherOrder on SSLCipherSuite "EECDH+ECDSA+AESGCM EECDH+aRSA+AESGCM \ EECDH+ECDSA+SHA384 EECDH+ECDSA+SHA256 \ EECDH+aRSA+SHA384 EECDH+aRSA+SHA256 \ EECDH EDH+aRSA \ !aNULL !eNULL !LOW !3DES !MD5 !EXP !PSK !SRP !DSS !RC4" SSLCompression Off
RequestHeader set X-Forwarded-Proto 'https' env=HTTPS
ProxyPass "/static/" "https://comet-damn.local/static/" ProxyPassReverse "/static/" "https://comet-damn.local/static/"
ProxyPass "/nucleus/" "https://comet-damn.local/nucleus/" ProxyPassReverse "/nucleus/" "https://comet-damn.local/nucleus/"
ProxyPass "/nucleus-guacamole-0.9.8/" "https://comet-damn.local/nucleus-guacamole-0.9.8/" ProxyPassReverse "/nucleus-guacamole-0.9.8/" "https://comet-damn.local/nucleus-guacamole-0.9.8/"
SSLCertificateFile /var/secrets/httpd/pki/tls/certs/comet-nucleus_sdsc_edu_cert.cer
SSLCertificateKeyFile /var/secrets/httpd/pki/tls/private/comet-nucleus.sdsc.edu.privkey
SSLCertificateChainFile /var/secrets/httpd/pki/tls/certs/comet-nucleus_sdsc_edu_interm.cer </VirtualHost>
